definition: a content word that qualifies the meaning of a noun or verb
details:
noun
- a content word that qualifies the meaning of a noun or verb
= example: a content word that qualifies the meaning of a noun or verb
= synonyms: modifier
- a contestant who meets certain requirements and so qualifies to take part in the next stage of competition
= example: a contestant who meets certain requirements and so qualifies to take part in the next stage of competition
